message.content: cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MED, cs.NEURON - The paper proposes the use of a deep convolutional neural network for the semantic segmentation of interstitial lung diseases (ILDs) in thoracic CT scans. This involves image analysis and computer vision techniques, which are typically covered in the cs.CV sub-category. The use of deep learning and neural networks also suggests the cs.LG and cs.AI sub-categories. Additionally, the study focuses on medical imaging and diagnosis, which could fall under the cs.MED sub-category. Finally, the use of a purely convolutional neural network for semantic segmentation is a specific technique that could be of interest to researchers in the cs.NEURON sub-category.
